title: CMR consignment notes (international road freight)
dataVerified: Consignor, consignee, carrier, goods description, delivery location
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: CMR Convention (international road freight liability). Domain binding verifies carrier. Prevents altered goods descriptions. Cross-border EU/international trucking. Carrier liability limits. Damage claim documentation.
